nodes.text: 2V-R8, also known as Twowee Areight, was a Seneschal-series factotum droid owned by the Bounty Hunter who became the Grand Champion of the Great Hunt. Assigned to Hunter's D5-Mantis Patrol Craft when it was stolen by the bounty hunter in 3643 BBY, 2V-R8 was responsible for maintaining the starship and ensuring that its crew remained comfortable.

In Star Wars: The Old Republic all four Imperial classes receive a 2V-R8 droid as their companion when they acquire their ship. Hunter's 2V-R8 is the steward of the D5-Mantis Patrol Craft and is identical to other droids of its class except for a few lines during its introduction. Beyond the initial conversation with the player, 2V-R8 has no story interactions and is only used for gameplay activities.
